packages.PMPObs: See 'References' key below, for detailed obs provenance information.

rmsc_xy.Abstract: Compute Centered Spatial Root Mean Square
rmsc_xy.Name: Spatial Root Mean Square

rms_xyt.Abstract: Compute Spatial and Temporal Root Mean Square
rms_xyt.Name: Spatio-Temporal Root Mean Square

bias_xy.Abstract: Compute Full Average of Model - Observation
bias_xy.Name: Bias

mae_xy.Abstract: Compute Full Average of Absolute Difference Between Model And Observation
mae_xy.Name: Mean Absolute Error
